Types

ClapAudioPortFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  capfIS_MAIN, capfSUPPORTS_64BITS, capfPREFERS_64BITS,
  capfREQUIRES_COMMON_SAMPLE_SIZE
ClapAudioPortFlags = distinct uint32
ClapAudioPortInfo = object
  id*: ClapID
  name*: array[CLAP_NAME_SIZE, char]
  flags*: ClapAudioPortFlags
  channel_count*: uint32
  port_type*: cstring
  in_place_pair*: ClapID

ClapAudioPortRescanFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  caprNAMES, caprFLAGS, caprCHANNEL_COUNT, caprPORT_TYPE, caprIN_PLACE_PAIR,
  caprLIST
ClapAudioPortRescanFlags = distinct uint32
ClapHostAudioPorts = object
  is_rescan_flag_supported*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost;
                                   flags: ClapAudioPortRescanFlags): bool {.
      cdecl.}
  rescan*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost; flags: ClapAudioPortRescanFlags): void {.
      cdecl.}

ClapPluginAudioPorts = object
  count*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; is_input: bool): uint32 {.cdecl.}
  get*: proc (plugin: ptr ClapPlugin; index: uint32; is_input: bool;
              info: ptr ClapAudioPortInfo): bool {.cdecl.}
